articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opened
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opened
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition was opened to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the exhibition hall are more than 200 photos on the great Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il, who brought a phenomenal reality of realizing all the ideals of the people through his long journey of patriotic devotion last year, and the heroic struggle of the servicepersons and the people.
					
					 Among them are "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il gives field guidance to the Songjin Steel Complex", "The great leader Comrade           Kim Jong Il gives field guidance to the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station" and other photos on the matchless offensive spirit of Kim Jong Il who has made an endless forced march of field guidance all the year round.
					
					 Also there are photos on the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il for national reunification and global independence. 
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday.
					
					Minister of Culture An Tong Chun made an opening address there.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Paektusan Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The sports contest for Paektusan Prize was opened on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Competitions will be made in eight events, including basketball, volleyball, table tennis, ice hockey and skiing, during the contest to be held in Pyongyang and Samjiyon.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sportspersons.

articles.title: 3rd National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
articles.content:
3rd National Pencil Drawing Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The 3rd National Pencil Drawing Festival was opened to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Presented to the festival, divided into groups of experts and amateurs, are at least 800 drawings selected from the pencil drawing shows which were held in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Among them are works depicting the sacred revolutionary career of President Kim Il Sung and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk and the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There are also works on the intense loyalty of the servicepersons and the people who wish good health to Kim Jong Il, the people's happy life getting better and the stirring reality of Songun Korea, the invincible might of the revolutionary strong army of Mt. Paektu and the desire for reunification mounting in across Korea.
					
					 A ceremony of opening the festival took place at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, artists and fans, working people and school youth and children in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closed
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Officials of National Institutions Closed
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The 15th sports contest of officials of national institutions for Paektusan Prize for celebrating February 16, which was opened on Jan. 21, came to close with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Wednesday.
					 Competitions were made in eleven events in the contest divided into four groups.
					
					 All-round group titles were taken by the State Planning Commission, the Mansudae Art Studio, the Myohyang Guidance Bureau and the General Bureau for Service for People.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting with European Countries Embassies
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting with European Countries Embassies
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry held a friendly meeting with staff members of embassies of European countries here on Tuesday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and staff members of embassies of European countries.
					
					 Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung and officials of the ministry were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.

articles.title: Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches
articles.content:
Film Show Arranged for Military Attaches
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A film show was arranged for the military attaches corps here Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the corps.
					
					 The participants watched Korean documentary film "President    Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il Were Always Together on the Road of Songun-based Leadership". The film deals with the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in strengthening the People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces perfectly prepared in political and ideological and military technical aspects and making the nation's defenses impregnable.

articles.title: Military Attaches Visits Photo Exhibition Hall
articles.content:
Military Attaches Visits Photo Exhibition Hall
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the hall of national photo exhibition for celebrating February 16 on Wednesday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The members of the corps looked round photos on the leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and successes made by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Gifts from Chinese
articles.content:
Gifts from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China on the occasion of his birthday.
					 They were conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to China Monday by Feng Yila, director of the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact, on behalf of the families.

articles.title: Letter from Chinese
articles.content:
Letter from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter and a gift in the joint name of the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Shen Weiping, vice-president of the China association, conveyed the letter and gift to the DPRK ambassador to China on Monday.
					
					 Earlier, Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the general manager of a Chinese company.

articles.title: Letter from Foreign Diplomats
articles.content:
Letter from Foreign Diplomats
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps and officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here on the occasion of his birthday.
					 Swedish Ambassador Mats Foyer, doyen of the corps, conveyed the basket and letter on behalf of it to Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday.
					
					 On the same day the floral basket, presented by the officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies, was handed over to an official concerned by Hossam Moshir, cultural councilor of the Egyptian embassy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Korean residents in China was held in Beijing on Feb. 6 on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 It was attended by Chairman Jo Yong Hwan and officials of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and compatriots in China.
					
					 They first laid a floral basket in front of the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Adopted at the meeting was a congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from the regional association.
					
					 Its participants watched a Korean film showing the majestic appearance of the DPRK demonstrating its might with the arms of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Then followed a reception.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in China
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a reception took place in Beijing on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They were co-sponsored by the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact.
					 Present there were officials of the said associations and other personages of various strata and families of those related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					Shen Weiping, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, expressed conviction that the Korean people would register greater successes without fail by making steady redoubled efforts along the road indicated by  Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Last year was a year of great significance in Sino-DPRK relations, he said, expressing his resolution to make a positive contribution to deepening and boosting the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations in the spirit of "inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" this year with the 60th anniversary of the entry of the  Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and other occasions as momentums.
					
					 DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il is providing field guidance to the work in various fields of the national economy, making an endless forced march despite blizzard from the outset of the new year with his firm will to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living this year.
					
					 He said that the DPRK would make positive efforts this year, too, to steadily boost the traditional friendship between the DPRK and China generation after generation.
					
					 Meanwhile, a friendly meeting was held by the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact on Feb. 3.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin titled "Self-Reliance of DPRK" on Feb. 2 on the occasion of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Many countries and regions of the world are now in the grip of an economic crisis but the DPRK is striving to attain the goal of building an economic power in the spirit of self-reliance, the bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 Self-reliance is one of the revolutionary modes peculiar to the Korean people. The Korean people are the ones who make redoubled efforts as the outside pressure upon them increases and give fuller play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude as conditions become harder.
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of self-reliance is being given fuller play than ever before in the DPRK at a time when all the Korean people are giving free rein to the inexhaustible mental power to unfailingly fling open the gate to a thriving nation till 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, concluded the bulletin.

articles.title: Mexican Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Mexican Figure Praises Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The great idea, leadership and personality of General Secretary Kim Jong Il serve as source of tremendous strength of the DPRK.
					 Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, said this in a statement issued on February 2 on the occasion of the birthday of 
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il is a great master of ideas and theories clearly indicating the way to be followed by the cause of independence and he has enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed the Songun idea in depth.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership the DPRK has proudly gained the status of a political and ideological, military, scientific and technological and nuclear weapons power, the Workers' Party of Korea has developed into an invincible revolutionary party and the Korean People's Army has grown to be a matchless army, he noted, and continued:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has also paid a deep attention to the work for bringing about a fresh surge in the movement for the revival of socialism and impressed all the people with his noble personality.
					
					 All the members of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico hope that Kim Jong Il will enjoy good health and register great success in his noble work for leading the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people, he stressed.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets UN Envoy
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets UN Envoy
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with B. Lynn Pascoe, under-secretary-general of the United Nations for the Department of Political Affairs who is special envoy of its secretary general, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday when they paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Day of Islamic Revolution in Iran Marked
articles.content:
Day of Islamic Revolution in Iran Marked
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with staff members of the Iranian embassy here took place at the Meari Shooting Gallery on Wednesday to mark the 31st anniversary of the victorious Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the embassy.
					
					 Members of the DPRK-Iran Friendship Association were on hand.
					
					 The participants at the meeting talked to each other about the matter of further developing the relations between the two countries and played amusement games, deepening friendship.
					
					 Earlier, the staff members of the embassy visited "Pueblo", an armed spy ship of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Relics Belonging to Tangun Korea Discovered
articles.content:
Relics Belonging to Tangun Korea Discovered
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A ruined house dating back to the period of Tangun Korea has recently been discovered by Korean archeologists in the area of Richon-ri, Sungho District, Pyongyang.
					 The site, rectangular in plane, is 10.6-10.8 meters long and 6.15-6.3 meters wide. It has an even and solid floor. Found at the site were scores of broad and flat stones of different sizes believed to have been used as stone anvils.
					
					 Among excavations are also such stone tools as dagger, spearhead, luniform knife, plane blade, chisel, axe and spinning wheel as well as grindstones used for making them, totaling to scores of pieces.
					
					 The stone tools and half-finished things are large in number with earthenware amounting to only a few pieces.
					
					 Judging from the size of the site and the finds from it, the archeologists presume it to be a place of making stone tools.
					
					 The discovered relics and remains are of significance in research into the production activities and cultural development in the period of Tangun Korea, particularly into labor tool making techniques.

articles.title: Gift Plants Grow Well in Korea
articles.content:
Gift Plants Grow Well in Korea
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Plants belonging to Begonia hiemalis cv. and Bougainvillea spectabilis cv. have come into bloom in various colors in the International Friendship Greenhouse of the Central Botanical Garden of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					They were sent to General Secretary Kim Jong Il by Mototeru Kamo, a Japanese botanist and horticulturist, as gift on the occasions of the New Year Juche 99 (2010) and his birthday (February 16).
					
					 Besides such plants as Rhododendron indicum, Rhododendron Schlippenbachii, Hibiscus rosa-sinensic cv. luteus, Oncidium flexuosam, Acalypha hispida have sprung into bloom or leaf.
					
					 Growing in the greenhouse are lots of plants including Areca catechu, Washingtonia filifera and Euphorbia pulcherrima.
					
					 All of them were sent to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il by foreign people and overseas Koreans as gifts.
					
					 The number of gift plants has steadily increased. The greenhouse has acclimatized them to the climatic and soil conditions of Korea to send some of them to other botanical gardens throughout the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service's Suppression Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service's Suppression Flayed
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Buddhist Citizens Federation for Economic Justice, the Buddhist Environment Solidarity, the Buddhist Human Rights Committee and eight other Buddhist organizations of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 2 denouncing the puppet Intelligence Service's base suppression. 
					 At the press conference the organizations accused the IS of pressurizing Jogye Temple not to offer a venue for an event to civic organizations recently. They branded this as an undemocratic act of violating even the freedom of assembly and the authority of religious organizations.
					
					 They charged that intolerable is such suppression resorted to by the IS to block the event of civic organizations for the mere reason that they are opposed to the present "government's" unpopular misrule and moves to put media under its control.
					
					 The recent action glaringly reveals the dictatorial nature of the present "government," they said, demanding the authorities apologize for this and Won Se Hun, director of the IS, step down of his own accord.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported in Guinea
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- The Guinean Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots sent a message to the DPRK embassy in Conakry on February 4 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry which proposed to the parties concerned to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks for replacing the AA by a peace treaty this year which marks the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War.
					 The message said that the ministry extends full support to the proposal of the DPRK for peace, prompted by the desire to remain true to the international principle for encouraging dialogue to seek a peaceful solution of the dispute between states and the common interests in boosting the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and the mutual support and solidarity.
					
					 The Guinean government regards this proposal as a positive phase in building confidence and achieving peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and as measure of great historic significance and believes that it will help strengthen the international cooperative relations, the message stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Czech
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Czech
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Czech preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il,   was inaugurated with due ceremony in Prague on Feb. 4.
					Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association who doubles as chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold various political and cultural events including lecture and film show on the occasion of the February holiday to highly laud the undying feats of Kim Jong Il and widely introduce the successes made by the people of the DPRK in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Early in January Juche 35 (1946), a woman who had participated in the anti-Japanese armed struggle visited Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, in her house.
					 At that time Kim Jong Suk was devoting her all to assisting President Kim Il Sung in his work and safeguarding him without rest after returning the liberated homeland.
					
					 The woman suggested that the heroine find out her separated relatives since the country was liberated.
					
					 The heroine, however, said to the following effect: I want to meet my relatives and friends. The Japanese imperialists were driven out from Korea but, in place of them, the U.S. imperialists are present in south Korea. With the reactionaries running amuck, the situation of the country has become very complicated. So, General Kim Il Sung is working hard without sleep. Under such circumstances, how can I leave to find out them without helping him in his work? I won't do it until the situation of the country is stable. I have only one mission of safeguarding him as I did before.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il vuelve a visitar el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il vuelve a visitar el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, volvio a visitar el modernizado Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero y vio el algodon de vinalon que se produce en avalancha.
					 Sobre todo, contemplo varios productos de vinalon, incluyendo el algodon amontonado en el lugar de embalaje de la fibra en cordon de vinalon.
					
					 Al mirar y remirar el algodon de vinalon tomado en su mano, se mostro muy satisfecho por la produccion cuantiosa de este algodon Juche calificandolo de excelente materia prima textil comparable con el algodon y la lana.
					
					 Ya podemos proveer a nuestro pueblo de mucho mas telas de vinalon de buena calidad como lo deseaba el Presidente Kim Il Sung, dijo muy contento y continuo que el inicio de la produccion en serie de vinalon deviene el gran jubilo de todo el pais siendo otra gran victoria lograda por el pueblo coreano en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					 Subrayo que este orgulloso logro de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del complejo demuestra claramente que deviene el motor y la clave de todas nuestras victorias el poderio espiritual del pueblo coreano, que esta colmado del espiritu de la unidad monolitica, el de la fuerte dignidad nacional, el de apoyo en las propias fuerzas, el noble amor y la abnegacion por el futuro.
					
					 Volvio a evaluar altamente los meritos brillantes de los obreros del complejo destacando que ellos posibilitaron defender, mantener y honrar mas las proezas de direccion del Presidente, creador y forjador de la industria de vinalon, al abrir la brecha decisiva en la solucion del problema de vestido levantando con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas la moderna fabrica de vinalon basada en las ciencias y tecnicas de punta, y les dio el agradecimiento especial de maxima categoria. 
					
					 Esta empresa tiene la importancia clave en la materializacion del proyecto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de mejorar de manera trascendental la vida del pueblo, dijo y presento la tarea de producir en gran medida el vinalon y otros productos quimicos.
					
					 Enfatizo que para suministrar mucho mas telas al pueblo, es preciso normalizar en el alto nivel la produccion poniendo en pleno funcionamiento los procesos de vinalon nuevamente construidos y al mismo tiempo, impulsar energicamente la construccion del horno del carburo de calcio y otras obras por la ampliacion de capacidad.
					
					 Los eventos jubilosos, que se reportan uno tras otro en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion, pronostican el esplendido futuro de la gran potencia en que prospera lo todo, apunto y volvio a llamar encarecidamente a imprimir un viraje decisivo en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera produciendo un gran cambio en este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun se reune con B. Lynn Pascoe
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun se reune con B. Lynn Pascoe
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun departio el dia 10 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el subsecretario general de la ONU para los asuntos politicos y enviado especial del secretario general de la ONU, B. Lynn Pascoe, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Inaugurada exhibicion central de fotos por 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Inaugurada exhibicion central de fotos por 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 10 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la exhibicion central de fotos por 16 de febrero (cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					En la ocasion fueron exhibidas mas de 200 fotos alusivas a las grandes hazanas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien abrio la realidad singular en que se realizan todos los ideales del pueblo siguiendo al largo camino de abnegacion patriotica en el ano pasado y a la heroica lucha de todo el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					Entre ellas figuran las fotos "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il dirigiendo sobre el terreno el Complejo de Acero de Songjin", "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il dirigiendo sobre el terreno el lugar de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica  de Huichon" y otras que muestran el gran espiritu de ataque de el.
					
					Se ven las fotos que muestran las hazanas de mando del Dirigente realizadas para la reunificacion de la patria y la independencia del mundo.
					
					  El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del   ministro de Cultura, An Tong Chun.

articles.title: Inaugurada competencia deportiva por Copa Paektusan
articles.content:
Inaugurada competencia deportiva     por Copa Paektusan
 Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (el 16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quedo inaugurada el dia 10 en el Centro de Baloncesto del reparto Chongchun la competencia deportiva por la Copa Paektusan.   
					 Durante ese evento, tendran lugar en Pyongyang y Samjiyon los partidos de 8 disciplinas incluyendo el baloncesto, voleibol, ping pong, jockey y esqui.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin, los funcionarios correspondientes y los deportistas.

articles.title: Inaugurado III Festival Nacional de Esbozo por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Inaugurado III Festival Nacional de Esbozo por el 16 de febrero
 Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 10 en la Casa Internacional de Cultura de Pyongyang el III Festival Nacional de Esbozo en conmemoracion del 16 de febrero (dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					En este evento, que tendra la categoria de especialistas y la de aficionados, se presentaron mas de 800 piezas calificadas de excelentes en las exposiciones transcurridas en la capital y las localidades. 
					
					 Entre ellas hay las obras que describen la sagrada vida revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente                Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Tambien, se ven las otras que reflejan la gran fidelidad de todo el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, que desean la buena salud all Dirigente, la cada dia creciente felicidad del pueblo, y la realidad agitada de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Ademas, hay las otras que describen el aspecto invencible del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, la alegria y el optimismo del pueblo y la aspiracion de los compatriotas a la reunificacion que se llena de toda la tierra coreana.
					
					Participaron en el acto los funcionarios correspondientes, los creadores y aficionados a bellas artes, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares en la capital.

articles.title: MINREX organiza encuentro de amistad con extranjeros
articles.content:
MINREX organiza encuentro de amistad con extranjeros 
Pyongyang, 10 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea preparo el dia 9 un encuentro de amistad con los miembros de las embajadas de los paises europeos en Corea. 
					Fueron invitados a la ocasion los representantes diplomaticos y los miembros de las citadas sedes diplomaticas. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros funcionarios de la cancilleria.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
